body: Holy fucking shit! A happy end from a Bai Asuka hentai!? Hell must have froze over.

This was disgusting ngl. She got gangbanged cuz she wanted dick and at the end he ended up marrying that slut. Lmao these japanese authors defile all logic at least give mc a better girlfriend or just make him end up alone cuz this ending is the ending made by 12 year old lmfao
